Enumeration Type Documentation

enum XFCNET_BT_LINESTATUS
 

Holds bluetooth line status.

Enumeration values:
XFCNET_BT_LINESTATUS_DISCONNECT  Socket disconnected.
XFCNET_BT_LINESTATUS_FAILED  Connection failed.
XFCNET_BT_LINESTATUS_CONNECTING  Socket connecting to server.
XFCNET_BT_LINESTATUS_OK  Socket connected to server.
XFCNET_BT_LINESTATUS_CANCEL  Socket connection canceled.
XFCNET_BT_LINESTATUS_WAIT  Socket waits client to connect.
XFCNET_BT_LINESTATUS_ONHOLD  Socket connected but not accepted.

Variable Documentation

const UINT32 XFCNET_QUEUE_BUFFER_SIZE = 128 [static]
 

Size of the buffer allocated for packet (MTU).
